soilgrids-0-5cm.description: SoilGrids 2.0: global gridded soil information (250m resolution) for 0–5 cm depth. Includes clay fraction (%), pH in H2O, and Soil Organic Carbon (g/kg). Reprojected to EPSG:4326 for compatibility with tile centroids.
soilgrids-0-5cm.citation: Poggio et al. (2021), SoilGrids 2.0: producing soil information for the globe with machine learning. Soil, 7, 217–240. https://doi.org/10.5194/soil-7-217-2021
